scripts.android-build-apk: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android/ && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.ios-pod-clean: cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install && cd ..
scripts.android-build-release: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android/ && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.ios-build: npx react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.android-build: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.clean-android-dev: ENVFILE=.env.development cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew --stop && ./gradlew cleanBuildCache && cd  ..
scripts.android-build-dev: ENVFILE=.env.development npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.clean-android-pro: ENVFILE=.env.production cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew --stop && ./gradlew cleanBuildCache && cd  ..
scripts.android-build-pro: ENVFILE=.env.production npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
